hook.text: One side cared about price. The other about delivery speed. Both got exactly what they wanted.

buildup.text: Logrolling means trading concessions on different issues based on each side's priorities.

discovery.text: If you value A more than B and they're the opposite, you can trade and both win.

twist.text: This only works when you discuss multiple issues at once â€” single-issue deals can't logroll.

climax.text: Package deals create more value than arguing item by item ever can.

punchline.text: Trade what you can spare for what you can't.
